name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Build Engineer with over 10 years of experience in project delivery and resource planning. Proficient in ensuring compliance with health and safety standards while managing budgets and mitigating risks in high-stakes environments. Skilled in monitoring and auditing processes to enhance operational efficiency. Recognized for strong communication skills and a proactive, solutions-focused mindset that drives project success. Previously contributed to complex infrastructure projects, demonstrating expertise in **networking**, **civils**, and **cabling** methodologies.
